Springfield.Batman: The Dark Knight (roller coaster): Batman: The Dark Knight (formerly known as Batman: The Ride) is a steel floorless roller coaster designed by Bolliger & Mabillard located in the south end of Six Flags New England. The roller coaster has 2,600 feet (790 m) of track, reaches a maximum height of 117.8 feet (35.9 m), and features five inversions. The coaster was announced on February 6, 2002 and opened to the public on April 20, 2002.
